パッケージ jp.summit_tech.controller

クラス BaseController

Object
BaseController
直系の既知のサブクラス:
HomeController, PublishController, RegistController, UserSettingController
public class BaseController
extends Object
BaseController is to get user info at controllers

  • メソッドの詳細

    • getUsr

      public User getUsr​(String id) throws Exception
      Call User information.
      パラメータ:
      id - User id (not null, not blank)
      戻り値:
      User. If it isn't found, return user in the initial state
      例外:
      Exception - DB exception
